entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:52 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:52 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming west 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:52 PM CST Saturday 28 January 2023
